00025 #ifndef __DDVIDEOMODELIST_H__

00029 #include "OgreD3D7Prerequisites.h"
00030 
00031 #include <ddraw.h>
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre {
00034     class DDVideoMode;
00035 
00040     class DDVideoModeList
00041     {
00042 
00043     private:
00044 
00045         // Pointer to DDD interface
00046         LPDIRECTDRAW7 lpDD7;
00047 
00048         // STL list of drivers (Vector used to allow random access)
00049         std::vector<DDVideoMode> mModeList;
00050 
00051         void AddMode(LPDDSURFACEDESC2 lpDDSurfaceDesc);
00052 
00053 
00054     public:
00055         DDVideoModeList(LPDIRECTDRAW7 lpDD7); // Only allowed Constructor
00056         ~DDVideoModeList(); // Destructor
00057         BOOL enumerate(void); //Forces an enumeration / re-enumeration
00058 
00059         // List accessors
00060         DDVideoMode* item(int index);
00061         unsigned int count(void);
00062         DDVideoMode* getClosestMatch(int width, int height, int colourDepth);
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066         // Non-member callbacks
00067         friend static HRESULT CALLBACK DDEnumModesCallback(
00068                                     LPDDSURFACEDESC2 lpDDSD2,
00069                                     LPVOID lpContext);
00070 
00071     };
